measure.CatchLine: Establishes sunset for construction-in-process exemption from ad valorem property taxation for property located in enterprise zone.
measure.MeasureSummary:
Establishes sunset for construction-in-process exemption from ad valorem property taxation for property located in enterprise zone. 
	Takes effect on 91st day following adjournment sine die.
measure.RelatingToFull: Relating to construction-in-process exemption; creating new provisions; amending ORS 285C.255; and prescribing an effective date.
measure.RelatingTo: Relating to construction-in-process exemption; prescribing an effective date.
measure.AtTheRequestOf: (at the request of House Interim Committee on Revenue for Representative Nancy Nathanson)
measure.FiscalImpact: May have fiscal impact, but no statement yet issued
measure.RevenueImpact: May have revenue impact, but no statement yet issued

historyActions.ActionText: First reading. Referred to Speaker's desk.
